processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: You already wrote the main steps; confirm the program reads one integer and must print the sum of its divisors.
Think about what the loop must do: for each number from 1 to n, decide whether to include it in the sum, then produce the final output.
Refine the loop with sub-comments: for each i from 1 to n, if i divides n then add i to sum; after the loop, print sum. Then implement those comments in code.
